data.title: Peta Murgatroyd & Maks Chmerkovskiy Reveal Newborn Baby Boy's Name
data.meta_description: Maksim Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd have welcomed their third child, a baby boy.
data.text:
Instagram

Maksim Chmerkovskiy and Peta Murgatroyd are parents again!

On Friday, Maksim announced the birth of their third child, a baby boy.

Along with posting a photo of the proud parents in a hospital room at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in West Hollywood, he wrote on Instagram, â€œHe is officially evicted from his mom and he is sooooo cute!!!!â€

The delivery was a quick one. Maksim shared, â€œBirth details later but for now we wanted to let you all know that mom and baby are doing perfect, and delivery took around 47 seconds total! Exactly one push!â€

Maksim showed some appreciation for the love and support, writing, â€œMeans a lot and very much appreciated.â€

The parents followed up with a second post revealing their little one's name, Milan Maksim Chmerkovskiy.

Waiting for your permission to load the Instagram Media.

A day before their sonâ€™s arrival, Maksim attended the 2024 ESPYs, telling People magazine that he was prepared to â€œrunâ€ if there were any signs that she was about to give birth.

â€œIf you see me run fast here at some point, that means itâ€™s go time,â€ he noted.

Of his birthing plan, Chmerkovskiy added, â€œWhen she calls, Iâ€™m gonna hang up, because she knows Iâ€™m here, and if she calls the second time, right away, we have a plan where Iâ€™m in the car calling her back.â€

In February, the couple announced that they were expecting again.

Getty Images

Peta Murgatroyd & Maksim Chmerkovskiy Expecting Baby #3

View Story

In a video, Peta FaceTimed Maksim to tell him she was pregnant. Maksim was shocked by the news, saying, â€œBabe, stop, no way, youâ€™re pregnant?â€ He couldnâ€™t contain his emotions, even saying he was â€œtearing up.â€

She wrote on Instagram, â€œSurpising @maksimc on this FaceTime with my two friends secretly filming from different angles made it all the more hilarious. It took one hour for me to get the courage to call him ğŸ˜‚ and when he wasnâ€™t catching on we all couldnâ€™t stop laughing in the kitchen. I had the â€˜Iâ€™m so sick storyâ€™ the pickle and 2 bottles HAHA! Oh Maks ğŸ¥´.â€

She added, â€œYes we knowâ€¦we just had a babyâ€¦ haha! This was very unexpected at (4 months postpartum with Rio) but we are sooooo happy and so ready to be a family of 5 soon!â€
